Package com.linecorp.centraldogma.client.spring

Class CentralDogmaClientAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.centraldogma.client.spring.CentralDogmaClientAutoConfiguration
  • @Configuration
@ConditionalOnMissingBean(CentralDogma.class)
public class CentralDogmaClientAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Spring bean configuration for CentralDogma client.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  CentralDogmaClientAutoConfiguration.ForCentralDogma
      A Qualifier annotation that tells CentralDogmaClientAutoConfiguration to use a specific ClientFactory bean when creating a CentralDogma client.

      CentralDogma client​(Environment env, ClientFactory clientFactory, Optional<ArmeriaClientConfigurator> armeriaClientConfigurator)
      Returns a newly created CentralDogma client.
      ClientFactory dogmaClientFactory()
      Returns ClientFactory.DEFAULT which is used as the default ClientFactory of a CentralDogma client.
